content:
Note: The CRD link is the base URL which will return the services that CRD supports, it does not accept requests.

CRD and DTR IGs
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-crd/2018Sep/index.html
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-dtr/

CRD and DTR GitHub
https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/CRD
https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/dtr

https://dry-temple-63581.herokuapp.com/stu3/cds-services/order-review-crd

This is the new url for now, while technical difficulties get ironed out.
